extensions.name: Elaborated Add Terminal Residue
extensions.description:
New Improved way of adding a peptide, particularly
for multiple operations.

extensions.name: Chain Refine
extensions.description: Refine a chain. Adds a key-binding and menu item

extensions.name: Long Residues Refine
extensions.description: Refine many residues along this chain

extensions.name: Trimmings
extensions.description:
Oliver Clarke's Coot Trimmings - many useful extensions.
May not be compatible with other extensions.

extensions.name: Morph
extensions.description: Lots of Morph tools - and crankshafting

extensions.name: Elaborated Pepflip
extensions.description:
pepflip now acts on intermediate atoms by adding a
key binding

extensions.name: Expand Map Radius
extensions.description: Expand and Reduce the map radius (x-ray)

extensions.name: Use Stroke Characters
extensions.description: Some graphics cards or drivers can't draw the text that Coot uses by default - so use this work-around if that is the case

extensions.name: Keyboard Mutate
extensions.description: Use the Keyboard to Mutate Protein Residues - it's a speed-up because you don't need to use the mouse
